players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "Charlie, you were silent and the mafia killed Bob. I suspect you."
Diana: "Alice, I investigated Charlie and he's mafia. He killed Bob. Vote him."
Charlie: "I didn't do it, Alice. I think you're the real killer."
You: "I support Diana. Charlie, you were silent and Bob was killed by mafia. Vote you."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. Bob died at night; he was the killer. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.

You killed Bob.

Day 1 begins.

Alice: "Charlie, you were silent and the mafia killed Bob. I suspect you."
Diana: "Alice, I investigated Charlie and he's mafia. He killed Bob. Vote him."
You: "I didn't do it, Alice. I think you're the real killer."
Alice: "I support Diana. Charlie, you were silent and Bob was killed by mafia. Vote you."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. Bob died at night; he was the killer. Vote Charlie."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
Alice: "Charlie, you were silent and the mafia killed Bob. I suspect you."
You: "Alice, I investigated Charlie and he's mafia. He killed Bob. Vote him."
Charlie: "I didn't do it, Alice. I think you're the real killer."
Alice: "I support Diana. Charlie, you were silent and Bob was killed by mafia. Vote you."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. Bob died at night; he was the killer. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
